<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Metamagic Channel](/Feats.aspx?ID=310) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 127 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy. Use 1 metamagic action that you can perform that normally takes 1 action and can be applied to the [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell. If you use it in this way, its effects apply only to a _harm_ or _heal_ spell.
name: Metamagic Channel
